tool_description: it is amazonscraper api which is accessible by everyone.
name: amazonscraper
title: amazonscraper

api_list.name: GET Amazon Products Details
api_list.description: this api is used for geeting the amazon products
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazonscraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/New-Apple-iPhone-11-64GB/B08L8C1NJ3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazonscraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazonscraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productname}/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazonscraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
